title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, objectives, and requirements. Conduct research on construction waste management practices, regulations, and existing solutions. Gather stakeholder input from construction companies, waste management facilities, and relevant government agencies. Identify key features and functionalities, such as material demand forecasting, waste tracking, recycling opportunities identification, and regulatory compliance. Consider data sources, integration requirements, and user interface design.

title: System Architecture Design
description:
Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flow, and integration points. Define the AI model architecture and algorithms for waste prediction and optimization. Consider the following aspects: 
- Data ingestion pipeline (from construction management systems and other data sources)
- Data preprocessing (cleaning, feature engineering)
- Model training and evaluation (supervised learning, time-series forecasting)
- Deployment and monitoring (containerization, orchestration, monitoring)
- User interface (web application or mobile app)
- Integration with construction management systems (APIs, data exchange formats). Additionally, consider edge cases, error handling, and performance optimizations throughout the system design.

title: Data Collection and Preparation
description: Identify and acquire relevant data sources for training the AI model, such as construction project data, material specifications, and waste management practices. Preprocess and clean the data for model training.

title: AI Model Development
description: Implement the AI algorithms and models for waste prediction and optimization based on the defined architecture. Develop and train the models using the prepared data.

title: User Interface Design and Development
description: Design and develop the user interface for the system, including input interfaces for project data and material specifications, as well as visualization tools for waste predictions and optimization recommendations.
